text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased API Error Rates and Latencies>
We are investigating increased API error rates and latencies for Instance and AMI related API calls in the US-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased API Error Rates and Latencies>
Between March 12 9:00 PM and March 13 2:21 AM PDT we experienced increased error rates and latencies for Instance and AMI related API calls in the US-EAST-1 Region. Existing running instances were unaffected. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: DNS Resolution Issues>
We are investigating intermittent DNS resolution issues in a single Availability Zone in the SA-EAST-1 Region.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] DNS Resolution Issues>
Between 1:41 PM and 2:30 PM PDT we experienced intermittent DNS resolution issues in a single Availability Zone in the SA-EAST-1 Region. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
